tool_description: Retrieve technical specifications and current pricing for numerous electronic devices (laptops, smartphones, ...)
name: Device Specs
title: Device Specs

api_list.name: Fuzzy search
api_list.description:
The fuzzy search endpoint allows users to search the entire database of products on any device, regardless of device type. It is a general search function that searches the whole database.
The endpoint will search on name and on info of each data object.

api_list.name: Smartphone details
api_list.description: API endpoint to get the details of one smartphone. Keep in mind that, if you want to get the prices and images, you have to use the populate parameter.

api_list.name: Smartphone List
api_list.description:
API endpoint to get a list of smartphones. Keep in mind that, if you want to get the prices and images, you have to use the populate parameter.
Use the the filtering and sorting parameters to get more specific results.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://device-specs1.p.rapidapi.com/smartphones"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "device-specs1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Laptops list
api_list.description:
API endpoint to get a list of laptops. Keep in mind that, if you want to get the prices and images, you have to use the populate parameter.
Use the the filtering and sorting parameters to get more specific results.

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "device-specs1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Laptop details
api_list.description: API endpoint to get the details of one laptop. Keep in mind that, if you want to get the prices and images, you have to use the populate parameter.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://device-specs1.p.rapidapi.com/laptops/123"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "device-specs1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://device-specs1.p.rapidapi.com/laptops/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "device-specs1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
